1)","params":{"_depositAmount":"deposit amount, in reserve token","_reserveBalance":"total reserve token balance","_reserveRatio":"reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000","_supply":"continuous token total supply"},"returns":{"_0":"purchase return amount"}},"calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint256)":{"details":"given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio and a sell amount (in the continuous token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the reserve token)    * Formula: Return = _reserveBalance * (1 - (1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO)))","params":{"_reserveBalance":"total reserve token balance","_reserveRatio":"constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000","_sellAmount":"sell amount, in the continuous token itself","_supply":"continuous token total supply"},"returns":{"_0":"sale return amount"}}},"title":"Bancor formula by Bancor * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements; and to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0. \""},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/x/Desktop/eth/BIOPv3/contracts/ContinuousToken/math/BancorFormula.sol":"BancorFormula"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/x/Desktop/eth/BIOPv3/contracts/ContinuousToken/math/BancorFormula.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc61f7796e38cee9a1dbdd6792767bfbad3da58d524228b1417020f765daa4ca8","urls":["bzz-raw://fd23b56e356197dea7ae134699429c80dd6e4e74426bd82d06a288c3d92951fb","dweb:/ipfs/QmdV2Q2LpYSWsX88MFfPoHWajZJoxb2NjR2Bra4V5DkTBU"]},"/Users/x/Desktop/eth/BIOPv3/contracts/ContinuousToken/math/Power.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcbec735747b0983541491fa9ea9e5a8c1c96763a9b448d64d33a966f239afb4d","urls":["bzz-raw://83123b0b73942c50e830b2835c0b596c594f2078468d70cd767fef1b90c47008","dweb:/ipfs/Qmb8RDkScxT35xutBiVgf4cs4Nutz43joME5k9R6Q9dcfr"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3b21f2c8d626de3b9925ae33e972d8bf5c8b1bffb3f4ee94daeed7d0679036e6","urls":["bzz-raw://7f8d45329fecbf0836ad7543330c3ecd0f8d0ffa42d4016278c3eb2215fdcdfe","dweb:/ipfs/QmXWLT7GcnHtA5NiD6MFi2CV3EWJY4wv5mLNnypqYDrxL3"]}},"version":1}

calculatePurchaseReturn(uint256,uint256,.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio, and a deposit amount (in the reserve token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the continuous token)    * Formula: Return = _supply * ((1 + _depositAmount / _reserveBalance) ^ (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO) - 1)

calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio and a sell amount (in the continuous token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the reserve token)    * Formula: Return = _reserveBalance * (1 - (1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO)))

params._reserveRatio: constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000
params._sellAmount: sell amount, in the continuous token itself
